cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

home.banner_subtext: We enable our clients to reach new markets globally by connecting with their audiences and providing the best possible customer experience — in any language.
home.benefits_subtext1: Translation of documents of all types, including highly technical and industry-specific documents, into over 190 languages.
home.benefits_subtext2: Plan, execute and manage your global campaign ensuring messages are well targeted for your international audiences.
home.benefits_subtext3: The most sophisticated, yet simple to use, translation APIs for continuous localization, content extraction from 71 file formats.
home.review_desc: “There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet.”
home.cta_subtext: Top companies from all over the world come to us when they want to engage with global audiences in new markets. From retail and travel companies to financial services and life sciences organizations, we're the leading choice for professional translations in over 190 languages with more than 50,000 native-speaking linguists.
home.our_subtext1: Fully managed solutions for bringing your website to another culture, from multilingual Wordpress sites to complex architectures.
home.our_subtext2: We have been Google’s partner for the translation of thousands of Ads and keywords since 2017.
home.our_subtext3: Over 10,000 hours of movies & TV Shows adapted with subtitling, voice overs, and dubbing.
home.our_subtext4: We localize the original files of your mobile app or desktop software and test them afterwards, sparing you the trouble of copying and pasting.
home.our_subtext5: Desktop Publishing in 140 languages, including Asian and right to left languages, to deliver a ready to print file.
home.our_subtext6: Our professional translation services can be certified or sworn in Court, depending on the country where you must present document.
home.our_subtext7: From the high-touch training of translators to match your preferred style, to APIs and custom workflow design.
home.our_subtext8: Integration with chatbot platforms, CMS and customer support ticketing software, dataset expansion, and post-localization testing.
home.our_subtext9: We can translate large volumes in a matter of hours thanks to our extensive network of optimized translators.
home.our_subtext10: Use our online quote to experience the fast and easy way to translate your documents in 190 languages, since 2017.
home.key_mainsubtext: We enable our clients to reach new markets globally by connecting with their audiences and providing the best possible customer experience — in any language.
home.key_subtext1: We have delivered 1.1 million translations in 190 languages to 100,000 clients in 40 macro-domains since 2017, powering the globalization strategy of the most demanding clients.
home.key_subtext2: We work hard to make translation services more effective, by enhancing our production processes with great technologies and talented people. A perfect example is Alisa™, the system that instantly matches your content with the most qualified translator for the job.
home.key_subtext3: We offer a wide range of linguistic services that cover all your future needs: Google Ads translation, software localization, subtitling, and APIs to integrate human translation anywhere you need.
home.embrace_subtext: Our strength is our people, and we are more than just a translation company. We're a family of committed individuals dedicated to being the world's leading enabler of global communications.
home.more_subtext: Our specialized industry experts know your business inside and out.
home.more_img_text: Hello, I'm Lisa. How can I help you?
home.instant_subtext: The easy way to get your documents translated fast. Buy online in a few clicks.

enterprises.banner_subtext: Our specialized enterprise division provides a suite of solutions to help you grow your brand online. From international search to global social media and marketplaces, visit the website for more information.
enterprises.accuracy_text: We work hard to make translation services more effective by powering our production processes with great technologies and talented people.

developers.banner_subtext: Translation APIs for continuous localization, advanced repetition leveraging, content extraction from 71 file formats and 21 content sources, neural adaptive machine translation, and much more.
developers.sup_subtext3: pdf, bmp, png, gif, jpeg, jpg, tiff
developers.sup_subtext4: htm, html, xhtml, dtd, json, yaml, yml
developers.sup_subtext5: properties, resx, xml, sxml, txml, dita, strings, Android xml, rt, wix, po, g
developers.sup_subtext6: MS Word, MS Excel, MS Power Point, MS Access, MS OneNote, MS Publisher, Open Office, Google Docs, Google Sheets, Google Slides, Zip
developers.work_text: We are constantly looking to hire great engineers with a global mindset. We are tackling the most difficult issue relating to AI: human language. We are doing it with ethics and speed by creating an unprecedented symbiosis between humans and machines.
developers.why_subtext1: We have delivered 400,000 translations in 190 languages to 50,000 clients in 40 macro-domains since 2017, powering the globalization strategy of the most demanding clients.
developers.why_subtext2: We work hard to make translation services more effective by enhancing our production processes with great technology and talented people. Our APIs help you integrate human translation anywhere and anytime you need.
developers.why_subtext3: Localization experts to support your internationalization journey and linguistic services that cover all your future needs.

translators.banner_subtext: Get the chance to work on interesting projects, at your own pace, and deciding your own rate. We provide the technology for free, and support your career with continuous education programs.
translators.recruit_subtext1: Rated as the best company to work with
translators.recruit_subtext2: Hundreds of interesting jobs assigned per hour
translators.recruit_subtext3: Free to decide your own rate per word
translators.recruit_subtext4: Get paid end of the month, as fast as an employee
translators.recruit_subtext5: Free to work with us from anywhere and anytime
translators.translator_subtext1: Apply to work with us as a freelancer translator.
translators.translator_subtext2: We welcome young talents, experienced professionals, and domain experts.

about.subtext11: We enable our clients to reach new markets globally by connecting with their audiences and providing the best possible customer experience — in any language.
about.subtext12: We’re a partner that can take you from planning to execution through our services, technology, consulting, and industry expertise. Our tailor-made solutions help you reach these new markets quickly, efficiently, effectively, and in a way that maximizes gains for your business.
about.subtext13: That’s why the world’s top companies turn to us when they want their global goals to become their worldwide achievements.
about.subtext21: Gettranslation was founded in 2017 with a simple mission to provide the highest quality language services to leading organizations worldwide.
about.subtext22: Our success is the result of the hard work and commitment of the most loyal and dedicated team of employees in the industry; they are the ones most responsible for creating and sustaining our culture of growth.
about.subtext23: Our strength is our people, and we are more than just a translation company. We're a family of committed individuals dedicated to being the world's leading enabler of global communications.
about.subtext31: One of the privileges of being a successful business is having the opportunity to give back.
about.subtext32: Gettranslation's commitment to good corporate citizenship has played a key role in shaping our culture and the way we conduct our business every day.
about.subtext33: At Gettranslation, we are involved in a variety of causes, including supporting local communities and a diverse group of non-profit organizations. We also commit both time and money to our employees' efforts to make a difference in the world.

quote.banner_text: Excel in the global marketplace with our translation services
quote.banner_subtext: We enable our clients to reach new markets globally by connecting with their audiences and providing the best possible customer experience — in any language.
quote.pay_item3: feel free to pay within 5 days from delivery via bank transfer, credit card, or PayPal.
quote.detail1_text1: Translation by a native professional translator. Full revision by a second native professional translator. Final quality control by a dedicated project manager. Translation memory and glossary included upon request. High-quality translation for publication purposes.
quote.detail1_text2: Translation by a native professional translator. Quality evaluation by a second native professional translator. Final quality control by a dedicated project manager. Translation memory included upon request. Professional translation for standard projects.
quote.detail1_text3: Light edit of a machine generated translation by a native professional translator to remove the most serious errors only. Not available for scanned PDFs and images. Valuable translation for understanding or personal use. Not suitable for publication purposes.
quote.status_error1: Unfortunately we could not count the words for this file.
quote.status_error2: Please insert the estimated word count:
quote.status_error3: if you wish us to count words for you.
quote.more_text: Have a large project? Get in touch.
quote.more_subtext: We will help you get a quote for complex documents, PDFs, websites, software, and more.
quote.more_img_text: Hello, I'm Lisa. How can I help you?

whychoose.title: Why choose us
whychoose.description: We pride ourselves in being considered one of the best companies to work with by translators. We pay them rapidly and fairly, wherever they are in the world.
whychoose.card_subtext1: We support the world’s best translators with advanced quality assurance processes. And that’s not all: we provide a free comprehensive translation review if you happen to be unsatisfied.
whychoose.card_subtext2: We offer the best performance levels in the industry, with an optimized workflow that guarantees over 95% of deliveries on time. Plus, in the unlikely event we miss a deadline, we will refund the translation up to its full cost.
whychoose.card_subtext3: We genuinely trust our clients, which is why we have created the Pay After Delivery model. With Pay After Delivery, you can pay within five days of the translation’s delivery via credit card, bank transfer or Paypal.
